designsDevelopment.subHeader: Magento, Shopify and Durpal  As platforms Have evolved over the years , bringing Features- enhancement and uprgrades from time to time. We are ready to play the role of development partner. We bring the years of experience of developing and maintaining the ecommerce stores into your business.

items.content: We setup and configure service to make your online store up and running Within a very short time . we install responsive  themes to ensure that your customers get consistent shopping experience across all the devices

Our approach is to follow platform's standards to design and develop themes from the scratch. We ensure that the theme developed is apt for your e-commerce business and customize them as per the needs of the business.
We assist clients to take your e-commerce store a notch higher by integrating third-party solutions such as social login, Amazon, eBay, QuickBooks, shipping and payment gateway apps.

Though the Shopify platform comes with SEO rich features, you still need to have strategy that helps you earn meaximum ROI. We help you enhance the store's SEO to show up on popular search engines like Google and/or Bing.

points: The offering covers various activities related to software version upgrades and functionality upgrades to add value to client's system and ensure its peak performance in the rapidly changing business environment.
Assignments related to DevOps consulting are also undertaken which would be the key part software application development cycle and also post deployment application management.

Majority of the small and medium scale businesses would not enough load to have/maintain a captive tech support team. This offering has been designed to assist clients with a tech support team on a shared cost model, without compromising on the end customer focus and the TAT of the responses and issue resolutions.
These services cover extended application software post-release support, operational, and helpdesk support to address various concerns and issues that may arise due to several reasons.

menuItems.name: Consulting
menuItems.subHeader: House of ECOM is a clan of brillient professionals with deep domain knowledge of ECommerce combined with experience of designing and developing state of the art tech products and managing large scale business processing services.

headings.heading: This Offering has been designed to cater to the contextual Need of talent in organisation of various sizes.
Be it a newly launched startup or a large scale organization, there are always instances where the team needs additional bandwidth to meet deadlines.
Under this offerings we are deploying consultants for a periods ranging from 3 months to 12 months , which could be extended based on the need and client’s business strategy.

remoteDevelopment.headerText: Remote development and Offshore development centre
points: The concept of Remote development has got proved beyond the doubt during Covid times.
The next challenge has emerged, to fight the right developers with required skills within the shortest possible times.
This has been addressed through the talent bench available at House of ECOM

We also specialise in setting-up highly customized offshore development centers with end-to-end management covering talent acquisition, performance management, statutory obligations and overall operations management.
